content: भू {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (rarely A.) (भवति, बभूव, अभूत्, भविष्यति, भवितुं, भूत) {@--1@} To be, become; कथमेवं भवेन्नाम; अस्याः किमभवत् <ls>Māl. 9. 29</ls> ‘what has become her fate,’ ‘what has become of her’; <ls>U. 3. 27</ls>; यद्भावि तद्भवतु <ls>U. 3</ls> ‘come what may’; so दुःखितो भवति, हृष्टो भवति &c. {@--2@} To be born or produced; यदपत्यं भवेदस्यां <ls>Ms. 9. 127</ls>; भाग्यक्रमेण हि धनानि भवंति यांति <ls>Mk. 1. 13.</ls> {@--3@} To spring or proceed from, arise; क्रोधाद्भवति संमोहः <ls>Bg. 2. 63</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">14. 17.</ls> {@--4@} To happen, take place, occur; नाततायिवधे दोषो हंतुर्भवति कश्चन <ls>Ms. 8. 381</ls>; यदि संशयो भवेत् &c. {@--5@} To live, exist; अभूदभूतपूर्वः… राजा चिंतामणिर्नाम <ls>Vās.</ls>; अभून्नृपो विबुधसखः परंतपः <ls>Bk. 1. 1.</ls> {@--6@} To be alive or living, breathe; त्वमिदानीं न भविष्यसि <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; आः चारुदत्तहतक अयं न भवसि <ls>Mk. 4</ls>; दुरात्मन् प्रहर नन्वयं न भवसि <ls>Māl. 5</ls> (‘thou art a dead man’, thou shalt breathe no longer); <ls>Bg. 11. 32.</ls> {@--7@} To remain or be in any state or condition, fare; भवान् स्थले कथं भविष्यति <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--8@} To stay, abide; remain, <ls>U. 3. 37.</ls> {@--9@} To serve, do; इदं पादोदकं भविष्यति <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--10@} To be possible (usually with a future tense in this sense); भवति भवान् याजयिष्यति <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--11@} To lead or tend to, conduce to, bring about (with <ab>dat.</ab>); वाताय कपिला विद्युत्… पीता भवति सस्याय दुर्भिक्षाय सिता भवेत् <ls>Mbh.</ls>; सुखाय तज्जन्मदिनं बभूव <ls>Ku. 1. 23</ls>; संस्मृतिर्भव भवत्यभवाय <ls>Ki. 18. 27</ls>; न तस्या रुचये बभूव <ls>R. 6. 44.</ls> {@--12@} To be on the side of, assist; देवा अर्जुनतोऽ भवन् {@--13@} To belong or pertain to (often expressed by ‘have’); तस्य ह शतं जाया बभूवुः <ls>Ait. Br.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 39.</ls> {@--14@} To be engaged in, be occupied (with <ab>loc.</ab>); चरणक्षालने कृष्णो ब्राह्मणानां स्वयं ह्यभूत् <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--15@} To conduct oneself, behave. {@--16@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To be prosperous, succeed. Used with a preceding noun or adjective भू serves to form verbs in the sense of ‘becoming what it previously is not’ or ‘becoming’ in general; श्वेतीभू to become white; कृष्णीभू to become black; पयोधरीभूत ‘becoming or serving the purpose of teats’; so क्षपणीभू to be or become a mendicant; प्रणिधीभू to act the spy; आर्द्रीभू to melt; भस्मीभू to be reduced to ashes; विषयीभू to form the subject of; so एकमतीभू; तरुणीभू &c. &c. {%Note%}--The senses of भू may be variously modified according to the adverbs with which it is connected; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पुनर्भू to marry again; अ विर्भू to appear, arise, to be evident or clear; see आविस्; तिरोभू to disappear; प्रादुर्भू to arise, be visible, appear; अग्रेभू to be in front, take the lead; अंतर्भू to be absorbed or included; ओजस्यंतर्भवंत्यन्ये <ls>K. P. 8</ls>; दोषाभू to grow evening or dusk-time; अन्यथा भू to be otherwise, be changed; न मे वचनमन्यथा भवितुमर्हति <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; पुरो भू to come forward, stand forth; मिथ्या भू to turn out false; वृथा भू to become useless &c. &c. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (भावयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to be or become, call into existence, call into being. {@--2@} To cause, produce, effect. {@--3@} To manifest, display, exhibit. {@--4@} To foster, cherish, support, preserve, enliven; पुनः सृजति वर्षाणि भगवान् भावयन्प्रजाः <ls>Mb.</ls>; देवान् भावयतानेन ते देवा भावयंतु वः . परस्परं भावयंतः श्रेयः परमवाप्स्यथ <ls>Bg. 3. 11</ls>; <ls>Bk. 16. 27.</ls> {@--5@} To think or reflect, consider, fancy, imagine. {@--6@} To look upon, consider or regard as; अर्थमनर्थं भावय नित्यं <ls>Moha M. 2.</ls> {@--7@} To prove, substantiate, establish; <ls>Y. 2. 11.</ls> {@--8@} To purify. {@--9@} To get, obtain. {@--10@} To mingle or mix. {@--11@} To change or transform into. {@--12@} To soak, steep. {@--13@} To devote or addict oneself to. {@--14@} To convince. {@--15@} To perfume, scent. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (बुभूषति) To wish to be or become &c. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (भवति-ते) To get, obtain. {vIII.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (भावयते) To obtain, gain. {vIV.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (भावयति-ते) {@--1@} To think, reflect. {@--2@} To mix, mingle. {@--3@} To be purified (connected with caus. of भू <ab>q. v.</ab> above).

भू {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Being, existing, becoming, springing from, arising or produced from, &c; चित्तभू, आत्मभू, कमलभू, मनोभू &c. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} The sacrificial fire.

भूः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [भू-क्विप्] {@--1@} The earth (<ab>opp.</ab> अंतरीक्ष or स्वर्ग); दिवं मरुत्वानिव भोक्ष्यते भुवं <ls>R. 3. 4</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 4</ls>; <ls>Me. 18</ls>; मत्तेभकुंभदलने भुवि संति शूराः {@--2@} Earth as one of the nine substances. {@--3@} The universe, globe. {@--4@} Ground, floor; प्रासादोपरिभूमयः <ls>Mu. 3</ls>; मणिभयभुवः (प्रासादाः) <ls>Me. 64.</ls> {@--5@} Land, landed property. {@--6@} A place, site, region, plot of ground; काननभुवि, उपवनभुवि &c. {@--7@} Matter, subjectmatter. {@--8@} A symbolical expression for the number ‘one’. {@--9@} The base of a geometrical figure. {@--10@} A sacrificial fire. {@--11@} The act of becoming, arising. {@--12@} The first of the three Vyāhṛtis or mystic syllables (representing the earth) repeated by every Brāhmaṇa at the commencement of his daily Saṃdhyā.
